name: Capital goods excise tax credit
text: The capital goods excise tax credit provided under section 235-110.7 shall be operative for this chapter after December 31, 1987; provided that the capital goods excise tax credit shall be inoperative after December 31, 2008, and before January 1, 2010. [L 1987, c 239, §8; am L 2009, c 178, §5]
